main.java

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a Map of ItemTypes to Integer amounts of each item.
    Version:
    1.0, May 2020.
    Author:
    Daniel Felgate, He Zheng Jing Rui

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory()
      Construct a new Inventory of every ItemType mapped to 0.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(Item.ItemType type)
      Add one of the given ItemType to the inventory by increasing its value in the map by 1.
      boolean hasItem(Item.ItemType type)
      Shorthand for itemAmount > 0.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns whether the inventory is empty.
      int itemAmount(Item.ItemType type)
      Returns the amount of the given ItemType present in the inventory.
      boolean removeItem(Item.ItemType type)
      Attempts to remove one of the item from the inventory.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Inventory

        public Inventory()
        Construct a new Inventory of every ItemType mapped to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • itemAmount

        public int itemAmount(Item.ItemType type)
        Returns the amount of the given ItemType present in the inventory.
        Parameters:
        type - The ItemType to check.
        Returns:
        The amount of the given ItemType present in the inventory.

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem(Item.ItemType type)
        Shorthand for itemAmount > 0.
        Parameters:
        type - The ItemType to check.
        Returns:
        Whether any of the given ItemType is present in the inventory.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item.ItemType type)
        Add one of the given ItemType to the inventory by increasing its value in the map by 1.
        Parameters:
        type - The ItemType to add.

      • removeItem

        public boolean removeItem(Item.ItemType type)
        Attempts to remove one of the item from the inventory.
        Parameters:
        type - The ItemType to remove.
        Returns:
        True if successful, False if none of the item is present.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns whether the inventory is empty.
        Returns:
        Whether the inventory has any items of any type.
